info.title: ModularSaaS API Documentation
info.description: Complete API documentation for ModularSaaS - A production-ready, enterprise-grade modular SaaS application built with Laravel 11 and Vue.js 3. This API follows REST principles and implements multi-tenancy, RBAC/ABAC authorization, and enterprise security standards.

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password. Optionally assign a role during registration.

role.description: Optional role to assign (must exist in roles table)

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, and issue a bearer token for API access

revoke_other_tokens.description: Revoke all other tokens for this user

post.description: Revoke the current authentication token and logout the user from this session
Revoke all authentication tokens for the current user and logout from all sessions/devices

200.description: Logged out from all devices successfully

get.description: Retrieve the current authenticated user's information including roles and permissions

post.description: Generate a new bearer token while revoking the current one for security
Send a password reset link to the user's email address

message.example: Password reset link sent to your email
User not found with this email

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email

message.example: Invalid or expired password reset token

get.description: Verify user's email address using the verification link sent via email

message.example: Email verification failed. Invalid or expired link.

post.description: Resend the email verification link to the authenticated user

message.example: Verification link sent to your email

get.description: Get a paginated list of all customers with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific customer's details by ID

delete.description: Delete a customer from the system

get.description: Retrieve a customer with all their associated vehicles
Search for customers by name, email, phone, or customer number
Retrieve comprehensive statistics for a customer including vehicle count, service history, and spending
Get a paginated list of all vehicles with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific vehicle's details by ID

delete.description: Delete a vehicle from the system

get.description: Retrieve a vehicle with all related data (customer, service records)
Retrieve all vehicles belonging to a specific customer
Search for vehicles by registration number, VIN, make, model, or customer name
Retrieve all vehicles that are due for service based on mileage or date

200.description: Vehicles due for service retrieved successfully

message.example: Vehicles due for service retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieve vehicles with insurance expiring within specified days threshold

200.description: Vehicles with expiring insurance retrieved successfully

message.example: Vehicles with expiring insurance retrieved successfully

patch.description: Update the current mileage of a vehicle

post.description: Transfer a vehicle to a new customer

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive service statistics for a vehicle
Get a paginated list of all service records

post.description: Create a new vehicle service record

service_description.example: Full synthetic oil change with filter replacement

get.description: Retrieve a specific service record by ID

delete.description: Delete a service record from the system

get.description: Retrieve a service record with all related data (vehicle, customer)

200.description: Service record with relations retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieve all service records for a specific vehicle
Retrieve all service records for all vehicles owned by a customer
Retrieve service records filtered by service branch
Retrieve service history for a vehicle across all branches

get.summary: Get service records by service type
get.description: Retrieve service records filtered by service type (e.g., Oil Change, Brake Service)
Retrieve service records filtered by status
Retrieve all service records with pending status
Retrieve all service records with in-progress status

post.description: Mark a service record as completed
Mark a service record as cancelled with optional reason

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive service statistics for a specific vehicle
Retrieve comprehensive service statistics across all customer vehicles
Retrieve a comprehensive summary of service history across all branches
Search for service records by service number, vehicle registration, customer name, or service type

get.summary: Get service records by date range
get.description: Retrieve service records within a specific date range
Get a paginated list of all users with optional filtering

message.example: You do not have permission to view users

get.description: Retrieve a specific user's details by ID

requestBody.description: User data to update (all fields optional)

delete.description: Delete a user from the system
